result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.orig: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.html: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: ṫug túr ṫeas an lárionad trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh

result.ponchtml: seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
